title: The Conquerors
description: This is the story of how Australia comes to the gold medal match in the zero-G wrestling of the 150th Olympiad. There is plenty of action on and off the grid as the team play hard for that illusive gold medal. Will Australia win? Or will the defeat crush a solid team beyond repair?***This will become a free book, available soon from eXtasy books!***
author: Mark Alders
